title: At the court at Whitehall, the nineteenth of November 1678 by the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, and the lords of His Majesties most honourable Privy Council : whereas His Majesty by his late royal proclamation ... did straitly charge and command all persons, being popish recusants ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,
